document_data.mainbody:
Purify self, also known as cleanse, was a divine alteration spell that cleansed the casters body and unsoiled their clothes.
When cast, this removed all of the dirt and filth from the casters person and their apparel. Their clothes were made immaculate and any injuries they had became free of infection.
This spell required verbal and somatic components as well as a small piece of soap.
